body.name: METABUILD XtremeCase PC Gaming ATX Case - High Air Flow Gaming PC Case - 360mm Water Cooling Support - USB 3.0 HD Audio I/O Panel MB410X
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
features: ATX motherboard support: Compatible with ATX motherboards, allowing you to build a powerful gaming rig with ease
Powerful graphics card support: With an upper length limit of 450MM, the case can accommodate high-performance graphics cards, delivering an immersive gaming experience
Support for water cooling: With the ability to support a 360mm water cooling system, the case allows for efficient and effective cooling for your high-performance components
Spacious and impressive design: This XtremeCase gaming computer case boasts a generous structure size, providing ample room for your components and ensuring a visually striking presence
Streamlined cable management: Designed with cable management in mind, this case helps keep your cables organized and hidden, ensuring a clean and clutter-free interior
Durable construction: Made from high-quality 1.0-1.5MM SPCC material, this case offers exceptional strength and sturdiness for long-lasting performance
body.description: The Ultimate Gaming Computer Case! Experience unrivaled versatility and performance with our gaming computer case. This case accommodates a wide range of setups. The sturdy 1 - 1.5mm SPCC steel construction ensures durability while providing excellent thermal management for your components.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Maximized Airflow Design, Easy Access and Maintenance, Water Cooling Support, Cable Management, Superior Component Compatibility See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great looking case just doesn't fit mob io shape.
reviews.reviewText: If you have a motherboard with a built in io shield it will not fit at all because of the bend over top of the motherboard.It came to me bent so I had to bend it flat for it to fit but with me bending it back I chipped the paint on it. Overall a nice pc case wish it also had a usb c port on the front but it doesn't so you will only have usb c on your mob if it has them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es demasiado grande pero genial

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for showing off a custom build!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not finished with the PC I'm building in this case. However, its a great case for showing off a custom water cooled build. Also, this case is very similar in style to other higher priced cases made by Antec and Cougar.Pros:Case comes fully assembled, except for the glass panels.Looks similar to some popular higher priced cases.Striking apeparance that reminds me of a motorcycle, mech, or helicoptor.Supports up to two 360mm radiators for custom water cooling or two AIO coolers for the CPU and GPU.Plenty of interior space on the metal aprts to attach LED strips for lighting effects.Cons:Not enough packing material. The top metal part of the case was bent, dented, and scratched. I'm not sure if I can fix it without hammering the metal flat and repainting it.Only one USB 3 port on the front of the case even though the cable and motherboard connector supports two USB 3 ports.No USB C ports on the front of the case.If yours arrives undamaged and you don't care about USB 3 or USB C ports on the front, its a great deal.
